attributes.review: I personally don’t care whether you download this or not, just do some research on who you support.
attributes.title: I downloaded this to be the 7,000 rating

attributes.review: Being the curious millennial that I am I downloaded to see what all the hubub is about. I didn’t realize I would bombarded with the hideousness that is Donald Chump’s face. If I could give this app a zero I would.
attributes.title: Cheeto puff

attributes.review: Shortly after downloading this app I lost my ability to reason and focused only on my hope in a nonexistent- past- greatness that was America.
attributes.title: App side effects

attributes.review: I was trying to support my amazing president but as soon as I opened the app,demons flooded my room!!They flooded in and began to terrorize me and said if I didn’t delete the app they would posses me 😖😣. DON’T GET THIS APP IT WILL SURLY LEAD TO YOUR DEATH!
attributes.title: Demons came through my window

attributes.review: This isn’t even about the app. These people are so mad that they leave the cringiest bs I’ve seen outside of 4chan. TBH it’s worse because those people will get bored of trolling. jfc
attributes.title: These reviews are cringe

attributes.review: Glitchy, way too many notifications, and full of propaganda. Do not recommend.
attributes.title: If I Could Give 0 Stars, I Would

attributes.review: If Trump hasn’t given you covid yet, this will! It’ll make your eyes burn when you open the app. I got a bloody nose right after it took nearly a week to download. Terrible app.
attributes.title: THIS WILL GIVE YOU COVID!!!

attributes.review: .....i accidentally downloaded this app and as sooonnnnnnn as i noticed......i had not choice but to destroy the phone......i don’t tolerate racism EVEN FROM MY PHONE😢
attributes.title: My phone broke as soon as this was downloaded

attributes.review: this app is SO bad it doesn’t even work 😳🧚‍♀️ i mean it took 5 weeks to download and then i opened it and there was an ogre on my screen someone explain🤢😳😨😭
attributes.title: read plzz

attributes.review: I can’t believe it the app deleted all the data in my phone 🥳🙃😒🥰🤓🙃🤩😘😎🙃🥳😉😒😘😉🧐🤩😒🥰🤓 because when I downloaded this at 3 am 😱 my phone blew up horrid app 0 stars 🙁🤨😤🤓😩😏😤🤓😏👨‍❤️‍💋‍👨🧚🏽🧚🏽🧚🏼‍♂️🧜🏻🧟‍♀️🧟🧜🏿‍♀️🧞‍♂️🧞‍♂️🧜🏻🧚🏼‍♂️🤰🧟‍♂️🧚🏼‍♂️👼👼🧜🏻‍♂️🧜🏻‍♂️
attributes.title: Nuuuuuuu🙃🤓🤨😉😎🙂😛☺️
